item.title: Democrats largely stand behind Jay Jones after violent texts
item.description: Amid concerns about political violence, some say the party risks looking hypocritical by sticking with the nominee for Virginia attorney general.

item.title: Trump-backed candidate prevails in Tennessee GOP primary for House seat
item.description: The president made a late endorsement Friday, backing Republican Matt Van Epps to succeed former Rep. Mark Green (R-Tennessee).
